rooms.name: Kolpruz
rooms.desc: This is Kolpruz, the capital city of the kingom of the same name.

npcs.name: old doctor
npcs.textn: Hello! Did you see my key? I'll give you 5 copper coins if you find it.

rooms.name: Castle Kolpruz
rooms.desc: This is the biggest Castle in this kingdom. You can see the throne room from the courtyard.

npcs.name: Royal Guard
npcs.textn: You need 10 copper coins to pass.

items.name: small key
items.desc: Keys open doors! You can use the small keys only once, though...

items.name: copper coin
items.desc: Copper coins is the currency in this kingdom. Make sure to pick them up everywhere you see them!

items.name: Castle Key
items.desc: You can enter the tourist section to the castle with this key.
